CAN Master Control Block. More...

#include <drivers/can/include/can_internal.h>

Data Fields

CAN_DriverState state
 CAN driver internal state.
 
CAN_HwCfg hwCfg
 Hardware Configuration of the CAN instance.
 
CAN_DCANCfgParams cfg
 Configuration used to initialize the CAN module.
 
struct CAN_MessageObject_t * msgObjectHandle [DCAN_MAX_MSG_OBJECTS]
 Message object handle book keeping.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiHandle0
 Registered Interrupt Handler. Indicates if interrupt 0 is configured. This needs to be done only during the first message object create. Subsequent interrupts are enabled using interrupt muxing.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiHandle1
 Registered Interrupt Handler. Indicates if interrupt 0 is configured. This needs to be done only during the first message object create. Subsequent interrupts are enabled using interrupt muxing.
 
uint32_t errStatusInterrupts
 Number of error and status interrupts received.
 
uint32_t messageInterrupts
 Number of interrupts received for message Tx or Rx.
 
uint32_t spuriousInterrupts
 Number of spurious interrupts received.
 

Detailed Description

CAN Master Control Block.

The structure describes the CAN Driver and is used to hold the relevant information with respect to the CAN module.
